name: Child of Titan (Prototype)
description:
Use the controller or the keyboard and mouse WASD and space to jump. You have to collect all the 4 Gems and climb the rock tower. Only then you can prove worthy of finishing this demo.

Credits:

Programmer: Creativejon https://jonnjayden2009.wixsite.com/creativejon

3d design: yusufu @ yusufu.artstation.com

3d design: Styx49  https://styx94.itch.io/

Sound: SoundCreations
